ptolemy.util

Interface StatusHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorGraphFrame, BasicGraphFrame, CaseGraphFrame, Console.ConsoleFrame, CustomizableRunFrame, DebugListenerTableau.DebugListenerFrame, DocBuilderGUI, DocViewer, DoubleShellTAPTableauFrame, EditIconFrame, ExecShellTableau.ExecShellFrame, ExpressionShellFrame, ExtendedGraphFrame, FSMGraphFrame, HTMLViewer, ImageDisplayJavaSE.ImageWindow, InteractiveDialog.DialogFrame, InteractiveShell.ShellFrame, InterfaceAutomatonGraphFrame, JVMTableau.JVMFrame, KeplerGraphFrame, ModelFrame, PlotTableauFrame, PtolemyFrame, PythonShellTableau.PythonShellFrame, QBEditor, RunLayoutFrame, RunTableau.RunFrame, SyntaxTextEditor, SyntaxTextEditorForStringAttributes, TabbedKeplerGraphFrame, TableauFrame, TclShellTableau.TclShellFrame, TextEditor, TextEditorForStringAttributes, TextualInteractionShell.ShellFrame, Top, TopTest, TreeTableau.TreeFrame, UserInteractiveShell.ShellFrame, WelcomeWindow

    public interface StatusHandler
    Interface for objects that can display status messages.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 11.0
    Author:
    Edward A. Lee
    See Also:
    MessageHandler
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (cxh)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Yellow (eal)
